SEARCH
Package org.example

Class Album

java.lang.Object
org.example.Album
public class Album extends Object
A class representing a music album. It contains a list of musical compositions and methods to manage them.
Author:
Onischenko Yevhenii

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Album(String title)
    Creates a new, empty album with the specified title.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addComposition(MusicalComposition composition)
    Adds a musical composition to the album ("records to disc").
    int
    calculateTotalDuration()
    Calculates the total duration of all compositions in the album.
    MusicalComposition
    findCompositionInRange(int minDuration, int maxDuration)
    Finds the first composition whose duration falls within the specified range.
    void
    sortByStyle()
    Sorts (rearranges) the compositions in the album alphabetically by their style.
    String
    toString()
    Returns a string representation of the album and its tracklist.

  • Constructor Details

    • Album

      public Album(String title)
      Creates a new, empty album with the specified title.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the album.

  • Method Details

    • addComposition

      public void addComposition(MusicalComposition composition)
      Adds a musical composition to the album ("records to disc").
      Parameters:
      composition - The composition to add.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the provided composition is null.

    • calculateTotalDuration

      public int calculateTotalDuration()
      Calculates the total duration of all compositions in the album.
      Returns:
      The total duration in seconds.

    • sortByStyle

      public void sortByStyle()
      Sorts (rearranges) the compositions in the album alphabetically by their style.

    • findCompositionInRange

      public MusicalComposition findCompositionInRange(int minDuration, int maxDuration) throws CompositionNotFoundException
      Finds the first composition whose duration falls within the specified range.
      Parameters:
      minDuration - The lower bound of the range (inclusive), in seconds.
      maxDuration - The upper bound of the range (inclusive), in seconds.
      Returns:
      The found musical composition.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the duration range is invalid.
      CompositionNotFoundException - if no composition is found in the specified range.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the album and its tracklist.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      A string containing information about the album.
